OOC: Jayde's not actually a Maximal, but Spike's welcome to think 
that.  Her overly belligerent behavior might ring an alarm bell.  
BTW, blowing up a ground-bound object is not going to do much to stop 
someone who's that far up in the air (I should've made it clearer, 
but Jayde's vehicle mode keeps her in the sky most of the time).

Jayde points her nose skyward to avoid the dust cloud Spike creates.  
Activating her cloaking device, she follows the speedy bot in 
secret.  "Let him think he's lost me," she mutters to herself.  "I'll 
show him a thing or two."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...> wrote:

cross
